about.me: I have a Bachelors Degree in Mechanical Engineering. I am Power Delivery Engineer. I do engineering for all things power-related.(Generation: Solar and Wind Design, Substation: Physical and Electrical Design, Distribution: Power Lines Design, Universal Power Supply: Installation of Backup Power) I have always been a fan of Cardano and I am very happy to now be supporting the network!
about.server: Vivid is running on Beelink SER3 with AMD Processor (4 cores, 8 threads) with 32GB of RAM. These units consume a maximum of 57 watts which is roughly equivalent to three phone chargers. Low power demands is great for the environment and backup power needs. Upcoming, Vivid will be powered by a battery backup system to ensure uptime to mint blocks. Vivid will incorporate solar and wind energy.
